turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Good day, Assistant. Can you help me order a cup of coffee from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the normal dark coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the starbucks pike roast?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any milks or sugars?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just need honey and whipped cream added to it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, honey and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would just I would like a medium size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would that be tall or grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a tall pike roast with whipped cream and honey, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like the Starbuck's Apps.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Rockefeller Center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your order to the starbucks at the rockefeller center.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you very much. Think that is all for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
